class_notes: "IVAC Capstone"Offered once a year, this capstone course is required of all graduating IVAC co-majors and focuses on professional practices including documentation, research, and development of an individual body of work situated in contemporary theory and methodology.
course_description: Offered once a year during the fall semester. This capstone course is required of all graduating IVAC co-majors and focuses on professional practices including documentation, research, development of an individual body of work situated in contemporary theory and methodology.
